reviewText: Outstanding dvd I love watching Notre dame high lites. Tks

I found the DVD excellent in the fact that I was able to see footage of players and games not available elsewhere. The footage was provided by the Notre Dame athletic department and in most cases coaches film was the only visual available. Networks either did not save footage on videotape due to the expense or did not make it available to Notre Dame for their use. Great way to immerse yourself in Notre Dame's glory years of hoops.
